title: Thai Green Curry
ingredients: * 1/2 cup of red bell pepper, sliced
procedure: 1. Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the lemongrass and garlic and cook for 1 minute, or until fragrant.
2. Add the green curry paste and cook for 1 minute more, or until the paste is fragrant.
3. Add the coconut milk, bamboo shoots, red bell pepper, green beans, and cherry tomatoes. Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add the basil leaves, lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, and salt. Stir to combine and cook for 1 minute more, or until the flavors are well combined.

title: Pad Thai
procedure: 1. Soak the rice noodles in warm water for 10 minutes, or until they are softened. Drain the noodles and set aside.
2. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the tofu and cook for 5 minutes, or until it is browned on all sides. Remove the tofu from the skillet and set aside.
3. Add the bean sprouts and green onions to the skillet and cook for 2 minutes, or until they are softened.
4. Add the rice noodles, tamarind sauce, fish sauce, sugar, and salt to the skillet. Stir to combine and cook for 5 minutes, or until the noodles are heated through.
5. Add the tofu and crushed peanuts to the skillet and stir to combine.

title: Tom Yum Soup
ingredients: * 1/2 cup of red chili peppers, sliced
* 1/2 cup of shrimp, peeled and deveined
* 1/2 cup of chicken, cooked and shredded
procedure: 1. Bring the chicken broth to a boil in a large pot. Add the lemongrass, garlic, galangal, chili peppers, lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, and salt. Stir to combine and reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 10 minutes, or until the flavors are well combined.
2. Add the basil leaves, cherry tomatoes, mushrooms, shrimp, and chicken to the pot. Stir to combine and cook for 5 minutes, or until the shrimp is cooked through.
